structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
PUBLIC WORKS IN CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 82. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 16.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Contract for work -- Advisement for bids -- Bid bond -- Doing of work on force account.
